clues.text: On May 28, 1843 this man known for his dictionaries & spelling books died in New Haven, Conn.

In chapter 2 of the book named for her, she replaced Vashti as queen of Persia
He was the youngest of Jacob's 12 sons
Luke is credited with writing the third gospel & this book, a continuation of it

rounds.text: Of the 14 countries that border China, it's the only monarchy & the only one with a population under 1 million
